text.tspan: Annual working hours vs. GDP per capita
Working hours are the annual average per worker. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in
Average annual change in GDP per capita
Average annual change in annual working hours per worker
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2017 prices, using multiple benchmark years to adjust for differences in living costs between
